biotools.summary: Online open-access database for genome biology of ictalurid catfish (Ictalurus spp.). cBARBEL provides BLAST-based, fuzzy and specific search functions, visualization of catfish linkage, physical and integrated maps, a catfish EST contig viewer with SNP information overlay, and GBrowse-based organization of catfish genomic data based on sequence similarity with zebrafish chromosomes.

bioschemas.name: The catfish genome database (cBARBEL)
bioschemas.summary: Online open-access database for genome biology of ictalurid catfish (Ictalurus spp.). cBARBEL provides BLAST-based, fuzzy and specific search functions, visualization of catfish linkage, physical and integrated maps, a catfish EST contig viewer with SNP information overlay, and GBrowse-based organization of catfish genomic data based on sequence similarity with zebrafish chromosomes.
